data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Brunetti, Riccardo, Manni, Lucia, Mastrototaro, Francesco, Gissi, Carmela, Gasparini, Fabio (2017): Fixation, description and DNA barcode of a neotype for Botryllus schlosseri (Pallas, 1766) (Tunicata, Ascidiacea). Zootaxa 4353 (1): 29-50, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4353.1.2|1 occurrence
